caption: The pop music features a female voice singing and being accompanied by other female voices. The drums and bass guitar play a simple and repetitive groove and drive the pulsation of the music. An electric guitar is playing a funky accompaniment. A group of strings play a repetitive melody that ascends in pitch with each repetition.
